title: Optically mediated particle clearing using Airy wavepackets
title_cn: 使用艾里波包进行光介导的颗粒清除
abstract: The Airy wavepacket solution for a free particle exhibits propagation invariance and, surprisingly, acceleration transverse to the propagation direction. Discovered as a solution of the free-particle Schrödinger equation, Airy wavepackets have been predicted, and in a recent major step forward, realized in the optical domain, but have never been used in any application. In this Letter we demonstrate the first use of the Airy light beam in optical micromanipulation. Based on the characteristic intensity pattern, the beam drags particles into the main intensity maximum, which guides particles vertically along a parabolic trajectory. This unusual property of Airy beams leads to a new feature in optical micromanipulation—the removal of particles and cells from a section of a sample chamber. We term this highly robust and efficient process ‘optically mediated particle clearing’, which enables novel microfluidic applications within the colloidal and biological sciences.
abstract_cn: 用于自由粒子的艾里波包解决方案表现出传播不变性，并且令人惊讶地具有横向于传播方向的加速度。作为自由粒子Schr dinger方程的解法，人们已经发现了Airy波包，并且在最近的一个重大进步中，已在光学领域实现了该功能，但从未在任何应用中使用过。在这封信中，我们演示了艾里光束在光学显微操作中的首次使用。根据特征强度模式，光束将粒子拖入主强度最大值，从而沿抛物线轨迹垂直引导粒子。艾里光束的这种非同寻常的特性导致光学显微操作的一个新特征，即从样品室的一部分去除颗粒和细胞。我们将这种高度健壮和高效的过程称为“光学介导的颗粒清除”，该过程可在胶体和生物科学领域实现新颖的微流控应用。

title: A chirped photonic-crystal fibre
abstract: Photonic crystals have widely increased the facility to guide and confine light at wavelengths close to the optical wavelength. Because they can include extremely sharp bends, photonic-crystal waveguides are a key element in future integrated optical devices. Moreover, they enable the manipulation of the spontaneous emission properties of luminescent devices, the localization of light in microcavities, and they may serve to generate negative refraction. A special class of these devices are the hollow-core photonic-crystal fibres, which confine the light by means of a periodic cladding, consisting of several layers of identical cells. This design resonantly decreases the transmission losses of such fibres to values of a few dB km−1 in a narrow wavelength range. However, the rather narrowband transmission bands and the detrimental third-order dispersion characteristics of this single-cell design generally render application of such hollow-core fibres difficult in the femtosecond range. Therefore, no fibre-based concept can currently provide guiding of sub-100 fs pulses over extended distances. By introducing a radial chirp into the photonic crystal, we here demonstrate a novel concept for photonic-crystal fibres that breaks with the paradigm of lattice homogeneity and enables a new degree of freedom in photonic-crystal-fibre design, eliminating much of the pulse duration restriction of earlier approaches.
abstract_cn: 光子晶体大大提高了引导和限制波长接近光学波长的光的功能。由于光子晶体波导可能会包含非常尖锐的弯曲，因此它们是未来集成光学设备中的关键元素。此外，它们能够操纵发光器件的自发发射特性，在微腔中定位光，并且它们可以用来产生负折射。这些设备中的一类是空心光子晶体光纤，它们通过周期性包层限制光，该包层由几层相同的单元组成。这种设计在狭窄的波长范围内将这种光纤的传输损耗共振地减小到几dB＆＃160; km ＆＃8722; 1 。但是，这种单电池设计的较窄的带宽和有害的三阶色散特性通常使这种空心光纤的应用难以在飞秒范围内进行。因此，目前尚无基于光纤的概念能在扩展距离内提供低于100的fs脉冲的引导。通过向光子晶体中引入径向chi，我们在此展示了一种光子晶体光纤的新颖概念，该概念打破了晶格均匀性范式，并在光子晶体光纤设计中实现了新的自由度，从而消除了大部分脉冲持续时间限制早期方法。

title: Organic plasmon-emitting diode
title_cn: 有机等离子体发射二极管
abstract: Surface plasmons are hybrid modes of longitudinal electron oscillations and light fields at the interface of a metal and a dielectric. Driven by advances in nanofabrication, imaging and numerical methods, a wide range of plasmonic elements such as waveguides, Bragg mirrors, beamsplitters, optical modulators and surface plasmon detectors have recently been reported. For introducing dynamic functionality to plasmonics, the rapidly growing field of organic optoelectronics holds strong promise due to its ease of fabrication and integration opportunities. Here, we introduce an electrically switchable surface plasmon source based on an organic light‐emitting diode. The source provides a freely propagating surface plasmon beam and is potentially useful for organic integrated photonic circuits and sensing applications. Furthermore, the demonstration of controlled coupling of surface plasmons and excitons in organic materials could prove useful for the fabrication of improved organic light-emitting diodes and organic photovoltaic devices.
abstract_cn: 表面等离子体激元是金属和电介质界面处的纵向电子振荡和光场的混合模式。在纳米制造，成像和数值方法的进步的推动下，最近已经报道了各种等离子体元素，例如波导，布拉格镜，分束器，光学调制器和表面等离子体检测器。对于将动态功能引入等离激元，由于其易于制造和集成的机会，迅速发展的有机光电领域具有广阔的前景。在这里，我们介绍了一种基于有机发光二极管的电可切换表面等离子体激元源。该源提供了自由传播的表面等离激元束，对于有机集成光子电路和传感应用可能很有用。此外，有机材料中表面等离激元和激子的可控耦合的证明可证明对制造改进的有机发光二极管和有机光伏器件有用。</ p>

title: Coupling of quantum-dot light emission with a three-dimensional photonic-crystal nanocavity
title_cn: 量子点发光与三维光子晶体纳米腔的耦合
abstract: We report on the first demonstration of the coupling of fully confined electrons and photons using a combination of three-dimensional photonic crystal nanocavities and quantum dots. The three dimensional photonic crystals were assembled by stacking planar components using a sophisticated micromanipulation technique. Point defects, containing embedded quantum dots, were introduced into the photonic crystals as active sites. By measuring the photoluminescence spectra of the assembly, the process by which light emitted from the quantum dots is coupled to the defect modes of a three dimensional photonic crystal was demonstrated for the first time. The characteristics of the sharp emission peaks agreed well with numerical simulations, and these were confirmed to be resonant modes by polarization measurements. The highest quality factor (Q-factor) for three dimensional photonic crystals (2,300) was achieved.
abstract_cn: 我们报道了使用三维光子晶体纳米腔和量子点相结合的完全受限电子和光子耦合的首次演示。 三维光子晶体是通过使用精密的微操纵技术堆叠平面组件而组装而成的。 将包含嵌入式量子点的点缺陷作为活性位点引入光子晶体中。 通过测量组件的光致发光光谱，首次展示了从量子点发出的光耦合到三维光子晶体的缺陷模式的过程。 尖锐的发射峰的特征与数值模拟非常吻合，并且通过极化测量证实了这些是共振模式。 达到了三维光子晶体的最高品质因数（Q因子）（2,300）。

title: Bifacial dye-sensitized solar cells based on an ionic liquid electrolyte
title_cn: 基于离子液体电解质的双面染料敏化太阳能电池
abstract: Solar energy is a promising solution to global energy-related problems because it is clean, inexhaustible and readily available. However, the deployment of conventional photovoltaic cells based on silicon is still limited by cost, so alternative, more cost-effective approaches are sought. Here we report a bifacial dye-sensitized solar cell structure that provides high photo-energy conversion efficiency (∼6%) for incident light striking its front or rear surfaces. The design comprises a highly stable ruthenium dye (Z907Na) in combination with an ionic-liquid electrolyte and a porous TiO2 layer. The inclusion of a SiO2 layer between the electrodes to prevent generation of unwanted back current and optimization of the thickness of the TiO2 layer are responsible for the enhanced performance.
abstract_cn: 太阳能是清洁，取之不尽，用之不竭的解决全球能源相关问题的有前途的解决方案。 然而，基于硅的常规光伏电池的部署仍然受到成本的限制，因此寻求替代的，更具成本效益的方法。 在这里，我们报告了一种双面染料敏化太阳能电池结构，该结构可为入射到其前表面或后表面的入射光提供高的光能转换效率（＆＃8764; 6％）。 该设计包括高度稳定的钌染料（Z907Na），离子液体电解质和多孔TiO 2 层。 在电极之间包含SiO 2 层以防止产生不必要的反向电流，并优化TiO 2 层的厚度是增强性能的原因。
